rows.label: bf11260100_0010
rows.name:
Yes. After Metsu sank their homeland, a lot of their
military units lost all semblance of command.

rows.label: bf11260100_0020
rows.name:
We're disarming them as best we can, but incidents
like what happened at that village still occur...

rows.label: bf11260100_0030
rows.name: We've seen firsthand how bad it is everywhere.

rows.label: bf11260100_0040
rows.name:
It's like every faction has forgotten what they were
fighting for and are just fighting for fighting's sake.

rows.label: bf11260100_0050
rows.name:
It just goes to show how little room
for error the world has left.

rows.label: bf11260100_0070
rows.name: By the way, how is the situation in Iira?

rows.label: bf11260100_0080
rows.name:
Under the wise rule of His Majesty the King,
the people are enjoying a life of peace...

rows.label: bf11260100_0100
rows.name: So in reality, it's the same everywhere...

rows.label: bf11260100_0110
rows.name:
Metsu's destruction has started
to reach Iiran territory.

rows.label: bf11260100_0120
rows.name:
Truthfully, we would like to send
reinforcements, however...

rows.label: bf11260100_0140
rows.name:
That's the whole reason the
Holy See of Acedia gave her to us, after all.
